lore: After the war against darkness, the Angels, creatures of blood and steel, lost their purpose and became lethargic, until the wars of humans caught their attention.\n\nA former scientist and priest of Vanelin studied these creatures and discovered that submerging them in water was enough to extinguish their flames that cover their body. However, they only need a few seconds to make them burn again. Those seconds were what the priest needed to run away before the Firewound Angel turned him to ashes.
menagerieDialog: (It appears to be calm, but you know a terrifying spectacle awaits its enemies.)
(This creature radiates an aura of violence. Perfect for decimating your foes.)
(You can tell it feels restless. Perhaps it knows a battle is coming.)
(This is perhaps the most serious and focused creature you've ever encountered. It will serve you well in battle.)
(It meets your gaze with a firm, confident, and yet obedient stare. This creature is well-suited for battle.)
name: Firewound Angel
